page.title: 17Sundays At My Home
page.content: In the morning we get up and make breakfast for Mum and Dad. Then Dad gets up and feeds the cattle and sheep. He goes to Bradley which is a farm with about 85 acres of land. After dinner we go to Sunday School where we sing hymns and choruses and then have a Bible story read to us in another room. Then at 3 o'clock the service starts and we have hymns, Bible readings and prayers. At 4 o'clock the service finishes and we go out and leave the older ones in the Chapel to talk. At about 5 o'clock we are called to get in the car and go home. At home we have our tea, play for a little while and go to bed. By Darren Pitts, age 11
